data.update title: A new update for this app
data.update message: Update this app because this version has some isues

items.title: Welcome :)
items.guide: This app contains all of the hints, tips, and techniques that we've learned while playing Block'em All game. Hopefully, these methods will assist you in improving you level at this game.

items.title: About The Game:
items.guide: Block 'em All is a small basketball game in which you must block as many shots as possible. It has some crazy physics, a lot of jumping around, and a few hard areas that may annoy you. And, to be honest, we despise it when you're frustrated. It's really aggravating.

items.title: Make your first move small:
items.guide: You must swipe to begin the level, but if your initial move is too large, you will fail. You will not be in a position to block the initial shot. It is preferable to just tap the screen â€“ That way, you won't move much and will be able to react to the first person in the line.

items.title: Wait for your opponent:
items.guide: Opponents use one of two approaches: dunks or shots. You should wait to see whether they move before attempting to stop them. It is a foul to strike an opponent when they are on the court. If you commit three fouls, you will fail the level. You can barge into a player who is in the air as often as you like. Take a moment to observe what is going on, then decide on the best course of action.

items.title: You must repeatedly block bosses:
items.guide: Boss ballers are enormous, with red energy bars over their heads. To prevent them from scoring, you must block them numerous times. Stay close to them and begin slamming into them when they're in the air. You can frequently knock them down before they've even delivered the ball.

items.title: Stop your movements:
items.guide: Just because you're in the air doesn't mean you can't adjust your course with a swipe. You can frequently knock them down before they've even delivered the ball. Instead of just waiting and hope you land someplace beneficial, utilize these to put yourself back in a good position to stop the following shot.

items.title: What are the gems for?
items.guide: You may use the gems to purchase fresh balls. They don't make any mechanical changes to the game. So it's up to you to decide whether it's worthwhile. You'll get enough money by playing that you shouldn't bother viewing the videos to enhance your earnings.

items.title: Special Thanks
items.guide: Thank you for downloading our app, and we hope it will help you get better in the game :)
